name: Building escape (Akshansh)
description:
i made it for school exhibition in 13 days so it's short about 3 to 5 mins maybe and it's just a prototype .

Controls 

W A S D move

C to crouch

F for flash light

Left shift to run

TIPS

Crouch near monster.

Axe lose durability on use it can only kill 3 targets so be strategic.

Spoiler

If game's too hard (if) press home key to make it easier (if needed ;))
